title: Will Shiv Sena's ban on Mahira Khan jeopardise release of Shah Rukh Khan's 'Raees'?
text: Shiv Sena has released a statement saying that they won't let Pakistan i actors and cricketers enter Maharashtra . Does this mean that Shiv Sena will protest against SRK's Raees which stars Mahira Khan? Â»
